Title: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of health to designate HTLV-1 and HTLV-2 communicable diseases; and relates to the HTLV-1 and HTLV-2 viruses
Summary: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of health to designate HTLV-1 and HTLV-2 communicable diseases; requires reporting of HTLV-1 and HTLV-2 cases to the department of health; creates educational materials about the virus.
LawCode: Add Art 21 Title 9 §§2185 - 2187, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize and direct the commissioner of health to designate HTLV-1 and HTLV-2 communicable diseases; and to amend the public health law, in relation to the HTLV-1 and HTLV-2 viruses
